Package model

Class Board_Games

java.lang.Object
model.Toy
model.Board_Games
public class Board_Games extends Toy
The Board_Games class represents a board game toy. It extends the Toy class.

    • Board_Games

      public Board_Games(String sin, String item, String brand, double price, int stock, int age, int Min, int Max, String developers)
      Constructs a new Board_Games object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      sin - the serial number of the toy
      item - the name of the toy
      brand - the brand of the toy
      price - the price of the toy
      stock - the stock of the toy
      age - the recommended age for the toy
      Min - the minimum number of players for the board game
      Max - the maximum number of players for the board game
      developers - the developers of the board game
